title: Wagner's Ring Cycle - Der Ring des Nibelungen (HD)
description:
Der Ring des Nibelungen

The Ring of the Nibelungen

This is a complete production of Wagner's "Ring Cycle," produced at the Bayreuth Festspielhaus in 1991 and 1992.  Boasting true HD video and surround sound audio, this 11-disc set is the finest version of Wagner's magnum opus available as a torrent.  

A technical note in the accompanying booklet (scanned and included in the torrent) warns that there are occasional "disturbing distortions" in the first 25 minutes of Das Rheingold, caused during recording by the on-stage lasers.  This was noticed during filming, but it was too late to fix it.  I did notice some distortions, but they do not impede viewing or ruin the experience.


Remember, the arts need your support!  Buy works you enjoy, and attend local performances.
